WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 23 MAR BY
   M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720 TOWING TEN 11112 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-01S 039-07W, 20-04S 038-50W,
   20-49S 038-59W, 20-46S 039-15W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 677/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 24 MAR 21.
